#+TITLE: French Verb Drill: Arts and Creation
#+AUTHOR: Generated by verbiste.el
#+STARTUP: overview

* Introduction

This drill focuses on verbs related to artistic creation and expression.
Practice conjugating these verbs in different tenses and using them in sentences.

* Verbs in this group

1. esquisser
2. dessiller
3. modeler
4. rainurer
5. collectionner
6. peindre
7. dessiner
8. sculpter
9. composer
10. créer

* Example Sentences

- L'artiste esquisse un portrait. (The artist sketches a portrait.)
- La vérité dessille ses yeux. (The truth opens his eyes.)
- Le sculpteur modèle l'argile. (The sculptor molds the clay.)

* Conjugation Drills

** esquisser

*** Present Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

*** Future Tense

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |

*** Passé Composé

| Subject   | Conjugation |
|-----------+------------|
| je | |
| tu | |
| il/elle | |
| nous | |
| vous | |
| ils/elles | |
